name: Freed Software
description:
Free Soft is a simulator in which you have to create your own IT company. In this world, you will have to compete with other IT companies for a marketplace in the software industry. Create your own companies, become a leader in the field of IT.

You will have to:
Start your own IT company.
Collect a lot of items.
Create and improve software.
Build and develop your own office.
Hire employees and build teams.
